alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 15 at 12:39PM AKST until November 16 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW FOR THE KLONDIKE HIGHWAY... .An approaching warm front will cross into the panhandle this evening bringing more moisture to the area. This precipitation is expected to fall as snow, especially across the the Klondike Highway. Snow is expected to be the heaviest during the overnight hours before rates diminish during the morning hours on Thursday. ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Klondike Highway. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 3 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow bringing periods of whiteout conditions along the highway. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected to fall between 6pm tonight and 3am Thursday morning, between mile marker 6 and the Canadian Border. A combination of heavy snow and strong winds will produce periods of blowing snow that will reduce visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
